text: The Brembo is a river in Lombardy, Italy. It is a left tributary of the Adda. The river has long. It flows into the Adda near Crespi d'Adda, between the comuni of Capriate San Gervasio, Canonica d'Adda and Vaprio d'Adda. Category:Rivers of Italy Category:Province of Bergamo
title: Brembo (river)
